posts.name: Naski Semah
posts.text: When a manager asks how long will it take to code new feature X... The answer is, I don't know You don't know because nobody can predict the future. It's an unrealistic question. There are way too many variables with software you can't possibly consider all of them,  you did, you will have already coded the entire thing in your head. The best thing is to focus on meeting the requirements and doing so correctly. Don't let the pressure to meet some deadline make you create bad code.
